title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 11.2 - Violations; unauthorized and unsafe banking practices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 11.2 - Violations; unauthorized and unsafe banking practices

State Regulations

Any insider transaction effected in violation of this Part or
failure by a bank or an insider to comply with the provisions of this Part
shall be deemed an unauthorized and unsafe banking practice in the conduct of
the business of the bank within the meaning of the Banking

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
11.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
